channel.title: North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Roheen BE
Accomodation
item.description: As much as possible we try and keep things local for both, the authenticity and sustainabilty of it.

item.title: Active Adventures
item.description: We offer Active Adventure tours for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh & Assam: Monyul & Brahmaputa Valley | CULTURAL JOURNEYS
item.description: Monyul and the Brahmaputra valley This cultural odessy takes you from the sweltering plains of the Brahmaputra to the high mountains of Western Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): The Rainforest Trek | TREKKING & WILDLIFE TOUR
item.description: A walk in India’s easternmost wildlife park This trekking holiday takes you to the Namdapha National Park located in eastern Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): Watershed of the Brahmaputra | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Birth of the Brahmaputra Valley This cycle tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh (the eastern most state of India) and Upper Assam takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: Assam: Jewels of the Brahmaputra | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Family exploration of the Brahmaputra Valley The setting for this family holiday is the lush Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Assam: Parks of the Brahmaputra Valley | WILDLIFE TOUR
item.description: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.

item.title: Assam: Parks of the Brahmaputra Valley | WILDLIFE TOUR
item.description: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.

item.title: Assam: Sanctuaries of the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.

item.title: Assam: Sanctuaries of the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.

item.title: Assam: Tea, Wildlife & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Up close and personal in the Brahmaputra Valley This multi-activity tour takes us to the Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: EASTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Watershed of the Brahmaputra
item.description: Far eastern explorations This active adventure holiday for the family is set in some of the only flatlands of Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Meghalaya: Backroads of Meghalaya | MOTORCYCLE & OVERLAND
item.description: The abode of clouds explored Starting from Guwahati the capital of Assam, this motorcycle / overland tour takes you through little known secluded roads of Meghalaya.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Natures Amusement Park
item.description: Family adventures in the Khasi & Jaintia hills This Adventure holiday for the family is set in hilly Meghalaya.

item.title: Meghalaya: Walks in the clouds | WALKING HOLIDAY
item.description: Explorations in the ‘Abode of Clouds’ This Walking holiday takes you to beautiful Meghalaya, ‘The Abode of clouds’.

item.title: Ezhil Vasanthan
Food
item.description: There is a great variety in cuisines between the communities of this region.

item.title: Nature & Culture
item.description: These 8 states lying in the Indo-Burmese and the Himalayan Bio-diversity hotspots are also home to over 150 unique and distinct ethinic groups.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): Theravada & Animist lands | CULTURAL JOURNEYS
item.description: Where the Hills meet the Brahmaputra valley We take you to one of the least known part of Northeast India.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): Walks in India's far east | WALKING HOLIDAY
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (West): High roads of the Monyul | MOTORCYCLE & OVERLAND
item.description: Riding along the Bhutan and Tibetian borders This Motorcycle / Overland tour takes you to Western Arunachal Pradesh which includes some of the highest motorable roads of the eastern Himalayas.

item.title: ASSAM: Family escape to the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Family exploration of the Brahmaputra Valley The setting for this family holiday is the lush Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: ASSAM: Family escape to the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Family exploration of the Brahmaputra Valley The setting for this family holiday is the lush Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Meghalaya: Hike, Bike & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Hike and bike in the land of the matriarchs This particular Multi-activity tour takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills of Meghalaya.

item.title: Meghalaya: Natures Amusement Park | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Family adventures in the Khasi & Jaintia hills This Adventure holiday for the family is set in hilly Meghalaya.

item.title: Meghalaya: The Abode of clouds | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: The Khasi and Jaintia hills explored on bicycles. This cycle tour takes you to picteresque Meghalaya.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Walks in the clouds
item.description: Explorations in the ‘Abode of Clouds’ This Walking holiday takes you to beautiful Meghalaya, ‘The Abode of clouds’.

item.title: WESTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Call of the Mountains
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: Manjit Saikia
Laidback Leisure
item.description: Holidays that take you away from the maddening crowds, kick off your shoes, destress and enjoy the serenity while we take care of the rest.

item.title: Visa & Permits
item.description: Our Wildlife & Culture Tours Visa Special Permits

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): Hike, Bike, Raft & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Birth of one of the greatest river valleys This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River valley.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): India's far east | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Far eastern explorations This active adventure holiday for the family is set in some of the only flatlands of Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Around the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Hills, Valleys, Forests, Rivers and Tribes Starting from central Assam we make our war east and north along the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Around the Brahmaputra Valley
item.description: Hills, Valleys, Forests, Rivers and Tribes Starting from central Assam we make our war east and north along the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: Assam & Arunachal Pradesh: Around the Brahmaputra | MOTORCYCLE & OVERLAND
item.description: Hills, Valleys, Forests, Rivers and Tribes Starting from central Assam we make our war east and north along the mighty Brahmaputra River.

item.title: Assam & Arunachal Pradesh: The Brahmaputra explorer | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Cycling the physical heart of Northeastern India This tour takes you cycling along the length of the Brahmaputra River, across parts of Assam and Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: The Brahmaputra Valley explorer
item.description: Cycling the physical heart of Northeastern India This tour takes you cycling along the length of the Brahmaputra River, across parts of Assam and Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: ASSAM & ARUNACHAL PRADESH: The Brahmaputra Valley explorer
item.description: Cycling the physical heart of Northeastern India This tour takes you cycling along the length of the Brahmaputra River, across parts of Assam and Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: EASTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Walks in India's far east
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Hike and bike in the abode of clouds
item.description: Hike and bike in the land of the matriarchs This particular Multi-activity tour takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills of Meghalaya.

item.title: Nagaland & Assam: Hornbill Festival and beyond | CULTURAL JOURNEYS
item.description: Tribes & Wildlife, Nagaland & Assam This tour takes you to western Nagaland and central Assam.

item.title: Nagaland & Assam: Hornbill Festival and beyond | CULTURAL JOURNEYS
item.description: Tribes & Wildlife, Nagaland & Assam This tour takes you to western Nagaland and central Assam.

item.title: Sikkim & W Bengal: Singalila Ridge and the Barsey Rhododendron Sanctuary | TREKKING HOLIDAY
item.description: A Trek amongst the giants The hills of North Bengal and Sikkim are a mystical land of abundant natural beauty with verdant forests, quaint sub alpine villages and high towering mountains.

item.title: Sikkim & W Bengal: Singalila Ridge and the Barsey Rhododendron Sanctuary | TREKKING HOLIDAY
item.description: A Trek amongst the giants This trek takes you to the hills of Sikkim and North Bengal, a mystical land of abundant natural beauty with verdant forests, quaint sub alpine villages and high towering mountains.

item.title: Iho Mitapo
Road Conditions
item.description: The Road condition across the northeastern states vary between excellent to the most atrocious.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (West): Call of the Mountains | FAMILY HOLIDAY
item.description: Family adventures in the gateway of Tibet On this family adventure we take you to Western Arunachal Pradesh, a region bordering Bhutan and Tibet.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (West): Hike, Bike & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Active & Interactive in the High Himalayas This multi-activity tour is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the state’s Buddhist belt.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (West): The high lakes trek | TREKKING HOLIDAY
item.description: Ridge running along the Bhutanese frontier This particular trek is set in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt close to the tri-junction between India, Tibet and Bhutan.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh: Tribes of the 'Dawn lit Mountains' | CULTURAL JOURNEYS
item.description: A cultural odyssey across Arunachal Pradesh. The origins of the tribes that are currently living in Arunachal Pradesh remain shrouded in mystery.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Abode of the clouds
item.description: The Khasi and Jaintia hills explored on bicycles. Meghalaya’ meaning the Abode of clouds is a green hilly state perched between the great plains of Bangladesh and that of Assam.

item.title: Meghalaya: The Trans-Meghalaya Explorer | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Cycling the Garo, Khasi and Jaintia hills The Trans Meghalaya cycling tour takes us across the three hill ranges of the state.

item.title: WESTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: The high lakes trek
item.description: Ridge running along the Bhutanese frontier This particular trek is set in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt close to the tri-junction between India, Tibet and Bhutan.

item.title: Joho Tayu
Safety
item.description: We offer Active Adventure tours for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

item.title: 4 States NE India: The Eastern Arc | MOTORCYCLE & OVERLAND
item.description: The wildest of Northeast India This particular ride takes us through the backroads of some of India’s easternmost states namely Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Assam and Meghalaya.

item.title: 4 States North East India: The Eastern Arc | MOTORCYCLE & OVERLAND
item.description: The wildest of Northeast India This particular ride takes us through the backroads of some of India’s easternmost states namely Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Assam and Meghalaya.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): Mishmi Hills Expedition | WILDLIFE TOUR
item.description: Cycling the Himalayan far east The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): The Mishmi Hills Explorer | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Himalaya’s eastern flank on cycles The cycle tour of Mishmi Hills takes you to the far eastern flank of the Himalayas, this is where the mighty Himalayan chain ends (or starts).

item.title: Bhutan: The Thunder Dragon | MOTORCYCLE & OVERLAND
item.description: Gross national happiness experienced This trans-Bhutan motorcycle tour starts and ends in the Brahmaputra Valley of Assam.

item.description: Birth of one of the greatest river valleys This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River valley.

item.description: Cycling the Garo, Khasi and Jaintia hills The Trans Meghalaya cycling tour takes us across the three hill ranges of the state.

item.title: Nongrum KD
Your Guides
item.description: The Team is one of the most experienced with years of field experience under the belt.

item.title: Sikkim & W Bengal: Monastic Trail | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Of Mountains and Monastries This cycling tour of Sikkim and West Bengal takes us through East, South and Western districts of Sikkim and the Darjeeling district of West Bengal.

item.title: Sikkim & W Bengal: Monastic Trail | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Of Mountains and Monastries This cycling tour of Sikkim and West Bengal takes us through East, South and Western districts of Sikkim and the Darjeeling district of West Bengal.

item.description: The abode of clouds explored Starting from Guwahati the capital of Assam, this motorcycle / overland tour takes you through little known secluded roads of Meghalaya.

item.description: Active & Interactive in the High Himalayas This multi-activity tour is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the state’s Buddhist belt.

item.title: Ahonda Menjo
Arunachal Pradesh (West): The Himalayan High | CYCLE TOUR
item.description: Retracing the Dalai Lama’s exodus from Tibet This cycling tour of western Arunachal Pradesh takes you all the way to the periphery of beautiful Tawang, lying close to the trijuncture of India, Bhutan and Tibet.

item.title: EASTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Watershed of the Brahmaputra
item.description: Birth of the Brahmaputra Valley This cycle tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh the eastern most state of India and Upper Assam takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.
